meanings.definition: To fold up or bend upwards.
meanings.sent1: She carefully upfolded the letter before putting it in the envelope.
meanings.sent2: He upfolded the map to show the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The magician upfolded the scarf, revealing a dove underneath.
meanings.sent4: The flower petals upfolded gracefully as the sun rose.
meanings.sent5: The origami artist upfolded the paper crane with precision.

meanings.definition: The act of folding up or bending upwards.
meanings.sent1: The upfolding of the bookshelf saved space in the small room.
meanings.sent2: The upfolding of the umbrella protected her from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The upfolding of the menu revealed a surprise dessert menu.
meanings.sent4: The upfolding of the mountain range created a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The upfolding of the wings allowed the bird to take flight.
